attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The TV licence is supposed to fund the BBC, which runs far too many repeats and too little of the good content it sometimes produces.
In fact some of the fee goes to the BBC, some does not, and some does not get spent where it should.
The vast majority of channels fund themselves through advertising, and quite frankly in this day and age to pay a fee to own and watch a TV is ridiculous and outrageous.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
